Title: Algebra: Reasoning Equations Inequalities
Question: Solve for x: 3x + 6 = 7
Explanation: Subtract 6 from both sides, then divide by 3
Keywords: algebra; reasoning equations inequalities; equations; expressions; variables; polynomials

Title: Algebra: Reasoning Equations Inequalities
Question: Solve for x: 2x + 5 = 5
Explanation: Subtract 5 from both sides, then divide by 2
Keywords: algebra; reasoning equations inequalities; equations; expressions; variables; polynomials

Title: Functions: Interpreting Functions
Question: What is the slope of the line y = 1x + 4?
Explanation: In the equation y = mx + b, m represents the slope. Here, m = 1.
Keywords: functions; interpreting functions; graphs; relationships; input; output; linear

Title: Functions: Interpreting Functions
Question: What is the slope of the line y = 3x + 0?
Explanation: In the equation y = mx + b, m represents the slope. Here, m = 3.
Keywords: functions; interpreting functions; graphs; relationships; input; output; linear

Title: Statistics: Using Probability Make Decisions
Question: Find the mean of the following data set: 14, 11, 11, 12, 1
Explanation: Mean = sum of all values ÷ number of values = (14 + 11 + 11 + 12 + 1) ÷ 5 = 9.8
Keywords: statistics & probability; using probability make decisions; data; mean; median; probability; statistics

Title: Statistics: Using Probability Make Decisions
Question: Find the mean of the following data set: 3, 8, 17, 19, 2
Explanation: Mean = sum of all values ÷ number of values = (3 + 8 + 17 + 19 + 2) ÷ 5 = 9.8
Keywords: statistics & probability; using probability make decisions; data; mean; median; probability; statistics

Title: Number & Quantity: The Complex Number System
Question: Simplify: (3 + 10i) + (5 - 9i)
Explanation: Add real parts and imaginary parts separately: (3 + 5) + (10i - 9i) = 8 + i
Keywords: number & quantity; the complex number system; numbers; operations; complex; vectors; matrices

Title: Number & Quantity: The Complex Number System
Question: Simplify: (9 + 10i) + (11 - 9i)
Explanation: Add real parts and imaginary parts separately: (9 + 11) + (10i - 9i) = 20 + i
Keywords: number & quantity; the complex number system; numbers; operations; complex; vectors; matrices
